content: crochet marble fidget pattern cazu kropsu 2024 crochet marble fidget you ll need 1 glass marble about 16 to 14 mm diameter fine cotton yarn i use friends cotton 4/8 difficulty beginner 2 5 mm crochet hook scissors a needle you can use this pattern to make fidgets for yourself as gifts or for sale you can t sell this pattern or replicate it for your own monetary gain abbreviations used single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase cazu kropsu 2024 the pattern the fidget is worked as a spiral so any color changes will not line up in a circle color changes are made by simply switching the worked yarn to another color the starting loop is made as a cord using this technique do not pull the starting loop tight as we will be using it later if you re using gradient yarn keep in mind that the other side of the fidget is started using the yarn tail that s left over from the cord if the tail isn t long enough to make the other side completely the gradient might not match up a circle but start the next round straight with a single_crochet to the first stitch 4 5 6 5 single_crochet increase 6 times 2 single_crochet 6 single_crochet increase 5 times increase 4sc 7 turn your work stitch of the starting cord use the tail so that the wrong side is on the yarn tail from the starting cord as long as it lasts then continue with inside the yarn from the skein 10 11 12 it looks but feel free to sew how you like 14 put in the marble and finish sewing shut make a knot and hide the ends inside the tube you re done have fun stimming
